title: How do I view my phone's data service status or turn off the data service?
answer:
Draw down the status bar and check the data service status. 

 If ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110870), the data service is on. To disable the data service, touch it to turn it gray ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110871). 

 [If ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110872), the data service is off. To enable the data service, touch it to turn it highlighted ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110873).]()
